title: Swivel Accent Armchair
description: Simple silhouettes with clean lines and squared arms are complemented by plush cushions, creating a versatile aesthetic with all-over comfort. This modern swivel accent chair is a cool addition to any room in your home! No matter where your need it, whether it is your living room, family room, bedroom, or office, this chair is ideal for any need.

reviews.name: Holly
reviews.review: A nice chair, good size not too big not too small. Love the swivel. It is a nice light color, so Iâ€™m hoping that it holds up well to my kids and pets because it is supposed to be performance fabric. We will see!

reviews.name: A Mom
reviews.review: Favorite piece in our new living room. So comfy. Everyone fights for it.

reviews.name: Mary
reviews.review: We love these chairs!! Love the color!!
